processedDockerfile:
FROM znc:slim
#  znc:slim removed them. Install them again.
RUN set -x \
 && apk add --no-cache build-base=0.5-r3 cmake=3.24.4-r0 icu-dev=72.1-r1 openssl-dev=3.0.8-r3 perl=5.36.0-r0 python3=3.10.11-r0
COPY 30-build-modules.sh /startup-sequence/
ENV GITHUB_TOKEN="ghp_8knPqc763zxKpbG8cIX7QEOMdnM-q43VEggY" \
    POSTGRES_PASSWORD="AHHEpElQALZc2r57JDttoOLNjQ/cj2FMoyAmqR3W"
originalDockerfile:
FROM znc:slim

# znc:slim removed them. Install them again.
RUN set -x \
    && apk add --no-cache \
        build-base=0.5-r3 cmake=3.24.4-r0 icu-dev=72.1-r1 openssl-dev=3.0.8-r3 perl=5.36.0-r0 python3=3.10.11-r0

COPY 30-build-modules.sh /startup-sequence/

HEALTHCHECK CMD znc -v || exit 1
originalDockerfileUglified:
FROM znc:slim
#  znc:slim removed them. Install them again.
RUN set -x \
 && apk add --no-cache build-base=0.5-r3 cmake=3.24.4-r0 icu-dev=72.1-r1 openssl-dev=3.0.8-r3 perl=5.36.0-r0 python3=3.10.11-r0
COPY 30-build-modules.sh /startup-sequence/
HEALTHCHECK CMD znc -v || exit 1
